publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4104 Kate Maclean: Tesco—That the Parliament condemns the decision of Tesco to relocate its Scottish depot away from the Dundee West constituency with the loss of 432 jobs; deeply regrets the fact that Tesco is prepared to break its long-term commitment to Dundee, and urges Tesco to put the decision on hold until it has met local politicians, trade unions and the Chamber of Commerce to fully explore all options for retaining the jobs in Dundee. Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support
S2M-4104 Tesco (lodged on 14 March 2006) Shona Robison*, Mr Andrew Arbuckle*, Maureen Macmillan*, Pauline McNeill*, Christine May*, Brian Adam*, Roseanna Cunningham*, Marlyn Glen*, Ms Sandra White*
S2M-4104 Tesco (lodged on 14 March 2006) Rosie Kane*, Dr Jean Turner*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Richard Baker*, Mr John Swinney*, Tommy Sheridan*, Karen Gillon*

S2M-4104 Kate Maclean: Tesco—That the Parliament condemns the decision of Tesco to relocate its Scottish depot away from the Dundee West constituency with the loss of 432 jobs; deeply regrets the fact that Tesco is prepared to break its long-term commitment to Dundee, and urges Tesco to put the decision on hold until it has met local politicians, trade unions and the Chamber of Commerce to fully explore all options for retaining the jobs in Dundee. Supported by: Shona Robison, Mr Andrew Arbuckle, Maureen Macmillan, Pauline McNeill, Christine May, Brian Adam, Roseanna Cunningham, Marlyn Glen, Ms Sandra White, Rosie Kane, Dr Jean Turner, Mr Frank McAveety, Richard Baker, Mr John Swinney, Tommy Sheridan, Karen Gillon
S2M-4104 Tesco (lodged on 14 March 2006) Janis Hughes*
S2M-4104 Tesco (lodged on 14 March 2006) Donald Gorrie*
S2M-4104 Tesco (lodged on 14 March 2006) Frances Curran*, Richard Lochhead*
